result.eng: They have promised that the work will be finished soon.
result.ga: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luath
result.orig: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luath
result.html: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luathThey have promised that the work will be finished soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeiḋ an obair críoċnaiṫe go luaṫThey have promised that the work will be finished soon.

result.eng: She had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ga: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.orig: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.html: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ponchtml: Ġeall sí dó é – ní ḟéadfaḋ sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside Ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
